title: Po aktualizaci na verzi 140.0.1ers přestal fungovat S/MIME elektronický popis emailu - nenalezen opovídající certifikát
content: Dobrý den, do aktualizace na verzi 140.0.1ers byl elektronicý podpis emailu S/MIME v pořádku funkční. Po aktualizaci přestal fungovat. Při pokusu odeslat podepsaný email, zadám heslo pro S/MINE podpis a pak se mi objeví hlášení o selhání - viz příloha. Nastavení bylo v pořádku. Přesto odstraněno a znovu nastaveno, ale nepomohlo to. Stále nelze S/MIME podepsat email. Při opakovaných pokusech jsem zjistil, že pokud nastavím aby se email podepsal S/MIME pak se v emailu objeví, že se ODEŠLE VEŘEJNÝ KLÍČ OpenPGP. Ale tento klíč nemám, OpenPGP nepoužívám. Nemám v Thunderbird ani Open PGP nastaveno. Nemůže chybu při podepisování způsobovat právě to, že se místo S/MIME podpisu snaží Thunderbird přiložit podpis OpenPGP? Pokud ano, kdy to bude opraveno. Děkuji
creator: petr.konvalinka

title: Здравствуйте!  При отправке сообщения возникает данная ошибка!
content:
Сделала новую подпись при помощи html кода и прикрепила туда картинку с ссылкой, еще другие ссылки , при отправке сообщения внизу экрана пишется данное сообщение " Thunderbird заблокировал загрузку в это сообщение файла. Разблокирование файла включит его в отправленное вами сообщение" При этом пропадает картинка и виден только контур где она раньше была. 

Можно конечно разблокировать сразу сообщение и картинка привяжется, но писем много и каждое разблокировать будет  неудобно и муторно. Можно ли как-то в настройках это убрать?

title: moving saved sent emails from local fodlers back to thunderbird
content:
Hello wonderful thunderbird community, I have had issue with with disappearing emails from my sent folder. For a few months now, everytime I send an email, I can not locate it in my sent folder. I reached out to my email holst company and they advised me to check the account setting under: 

Copies and Folders,

When sending message, automatically, Place a copy in, Other, I found the sent emails were saved in a local folder on my computer.

I looking into the local folder and found several files as per the attached screenshot.

Please let me know how to move these files back to the sent folder under thunderbird.

Thanks.

title: Please add support Thunderbird Arm 64 version on Flathub.
content: Mozilla previously released Thunderbird on Flathub. However, the version of Thunderbird available on Flathub does not support Arm64. As a result, many users rely on the built-in repositories of their Linux distributions to install Thunderbird. Unfortunately, the Thunderbird versions provided by many of these repositories are outdated. Using outdated versions poses security risks and does not meet modern security standards. I believe Thunderbird should provide an Arm64 build on Flathub so that users can more easily access the latest version of Thunderbird.
creator: xujie0739

title: SMTP Timeout
content:
Hi, I wonder if anyone has had a similar problem - since a few days I get an immediate SMTP timeout in Thunderbird for some mail servers but not all. For Outlook the same server works just fine. Version 140.0.1esr has recently been autoinstalled. It is possible that the problems started when that version was installed but I am not sure about the timing. The email provider has no explanation and claims there is no problem on its side. Also, Thunderbird has recently asked me to confirm a server certificate for receiving emails. Usually when that happens I also get asked the same question when sending emails, but this time I did not get the question for sending, I just get the timeout message.

Thanks,

Magnus
